pr_title: Fix unit tests ( TestHiveMetaStoreChecker and TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver tests ) in master

timeline.bodyText: Why are these changes are needed?
timeline.author: pvary

replies.bodyText: All tests here deal with transactional table, but doesn't initiate SessionState. So, this results in Nullpointer, when we try to retrieve transaction manager from SessionState, in order to derive ValidWriteIdList.
replies.author: kishendas
